title: [ Gameplay ] Sion E'd Minion Stops Unexpectedly
body:
So it's been a couple months now, and the bug with Sion's E still exists so I've finally decided to post about it. When playing Sion and you use your roar on a minion, occasionally, it will almost instantly come to stop (as if hitting terrain) instead of flying through the wave and into your cowardly opponent. It seems like it happens slightly more often if you use E immediately after a knock-up charged Q, but it's never consistent in when it does happen. It's kind of annoying because it can hurt farming abilities and definitely impacts your trading ability. I don't know what more to add, but if you need elaboration, just say so, and I'll try to come up with something or make a replay/video. :P

{{champion:14}}

replies.body: As a Sion main, I understand how you feel. I'm been trying to figure this one out for a while, but to no avail. I am just trying to find a consistent reproduction steps, then I can get it fixed. :'(
Do you know how Sion could, due to a bug, flash when he was in his passive form? I mean, yes it is due to a bug, but I do not know how to reproduce it.

Wait, you mean you can't just look through every line of code for the big red marker thay says bug? according to the complaints on the boards for {{champion:76}} and all them thats all it takes....... kappa.

In seriousness though, I've seen that bug a few times, and it's so weird to find conditions. Good luck!
